title: Exchange rate is relative currency price

content.question: In the foreign exchange market, the exchange rate is defined as

choices.label: the price of one currency in terms of another currency
the price of goods around the world
the price of a good in terms of another good
the discount that companies take when goods are returned
the quantity of a good to be traded for a unit of another good

content.answer: the price of one currency in terms of another currency

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
